sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  

export default class MDXContent extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props)
    this.layout = null
  }
  render() {
    const { components, ...props } = this.props

    return <MDXTag
             name="wrapper"
             
             components={components}><MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"data-model"}}>{`Data Model`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`The data model is derived from `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"https://schema.org/"}}>{`https://schema.org/`}</MDXTag>{`, whch is  derived from `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/RDF_Schema"}}>{`RDF Schema`}</MDXTag>{` (which in turn was derived from `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CycL"}}>{`CycL`}</MDXTag>{`, which in turn ...).`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"types"}}>{`Types`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`We have a set of types (`}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/RDF_Schema#Classes"}}>{`rdfs:Class`}</MDXTag>{`) arranged in a multiple inheritance hierarcy where each type may be a sub-class of multiple types.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"properties"}}>{`Properties`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Each property may have one or more types as its ranges. The value(s) of the property should be instances of at least one of these types. Unless explicitly declared, properties are semantically equavalent to their schema.org namesakes.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"serialization"}}>{`Serialization`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`RDF data has many available serializations.  Our focus here will be restricted to the most common serializations accessed via the API.  JSON-LD, and turtle.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"json-ld"}}>{`JSON-LD`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`JSON`}</MDXTag>{`-`}<MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`LD`}</MDXTag>{` (JavaScript Object Notation for Linked Data), is a method of encoding Linked Data using `}<MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`JSON`}</MDXTag>{`. It was a goal to require as little effort as possible from developers to transform their existing `}<MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`JSON`}</MDXTag>{` to `}<MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`JSON`}</MDXTag>{`-`}<MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`LD`}</MDXTag>{`. This allows data to be serialized in a way that is similar to traditional `}<MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`JSON`}</MDXTag>{`.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"json-ld-context"}}>{`JSON-LD Context`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`You may have noticed the JSON values in our example don't look exactly like JSON-LD.  Here's why.  `}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ol" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`No @context.  Since all the data in REflex should be using the same JSON-LD @context, we use the HTTP response header to set the context for all messages automatically.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`No @type or @id.  JSON-LD allows for aliasing @type and @id, so you can use @type and 'type' and @id and 'id' interchangably. `}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`standard JSON-LD example`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-json"}}>{`{
  "@context": "https://schema.org/",
  "@type": "Person",
  "@id": "http://dbpedia.org/resource/John_Lennon",
  "name": "John Lennon",
  "born": "1940-10-09",
  "spouse": "http://dbpedia.org/resource/Cynthia_Lennon"
}
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`example with default context applied`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-json"}}>{`{
    "type": "Person",
    "id": "http://dbpedia.org/resource/John_Lennon",
    "name": "John Lennon",
    "born": "1940-10-09",
    "spouse": "http://dbpedia.org/resource/Cynthia_Lennon"
}
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
           </MDXTag>
  }
}
